name: Retro Ninja
description:
Retro ninja is a new and inspiring platforming game which follows the emotional story of a ninja during a zombi apocalypse...

Our protagonist, Naiki, armed with a sword, some shurikens and her heart, will battle trough the world to save her beloved boyfriend.

How to play:

The game can be run on a real Amstrad cpc 464 or if you don't have one you can use an emulator like WinApe.

Each level will  have some enemies, you have to defeat them all to go through the portal so you can get to the next level. There are several kinds of enemies and bosses, some easier than the others. Your goal is to get to the end of the 70 levels to save your boyfriend.

Controls:
  • i -> jump
  • k -> step down from platform
  • j, l -> move left/right
  • z -> sword attack
  • x -> throw shuriken
Authors and licenses:

The game has been developed by Miquel Llorca Buforn, Juan Muelledes Mateos and Sergio Suescun Ferrandiz. Each one of us have done a bit of everything  but we specialized in:

  • Sprites and animations: Miquel.
  • Engine and physichs: Sergio.
  • Dessign, collisions and render: Juan.
